name: Tower Tower Defense
description: Defend your tower by placing defenses in this 3d tower defense concept. Rotate freely around the tower to defend all sides as you power up. Use each tower's ability to your strategic advantage, and keep in mind that not all towers have offensive powers. Some towers have strategic uses but no attack value. Enjoy, and please leave your feedback, keeping in mind that i am not a graphic artist and have left the art as  simple as possible on purpose.
